summary: Mark a freelance photographer wants to make a photo novel with the title 'Princess'. His girlfriend Margie plays the Princess. The novel with lots of sex and violence is a great success but Margie feels herself abused.
cast: Jan Bauwens|Polly Geerts|Herman Jacobs|Annie Laurie|Virginia Mailer|Franz Marijnen|Alice Toen|Mariette Van Arkkels|Jan Van Broeckhoven|Bob Van der Veken|Herman van Veen|Cara Van Wersch|Manuel Waugh|Gwynne Whitby|Fanny Winkler
title: Princess
